security: The dispatch concerns identifying an individual and requests a photograph to be shown to a source for potential identification. If the existence of the source or the methods used to identify individuals were compromised, it could hinder future operations.
summary: A dispatch regarding the identification of Manuel ESTEVEZ Perez, where AMMUG/1 was queried but unable to identify the name, and a photograph is suggested for possible identification by AMMUG/1 in Barcelona.
summary_one_paragraph: This dispatch, dated August 16, 1965, from Chief, WH 152 to Chief of Station, Madrid; Chief of Base, Barcelona; Chief, NE; and Chief of Station, JWAVE, concerns an operational matterâ€”specifically, the identification of Manuel ESTEVEZ Perez. AMMUG/1 was queried for information but could not identify the name. It is suggested that a photograph of the subject be sent to Barcelona to show AMMUG/1 for possible identification. The dispatch is for information and files.
title: AMMUG/1 Identification of Manuel ESTEVEZ Perez
recipient: Chief of Station, Madrid; Chief of Base, Barcelona; Chief, NE; Chief of Station, JWAVE
